Again, <S%G3825><s%> he sent <S%G649>forth<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G1401>servants,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2036>Tell<s%> them which are <S%G2564>bidden,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I have <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> dinner: <S%G712><s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5022>oxen<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> my <S%G4619>fatlings<s%> are <S%G2380>killed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> are ready: <S%G2092><s%> <S%G1205>come<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> marriage. <S%G1062><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> made light <S%G272>of<s%> it, and went their <S%G565>ways,<s%> one <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> <S%G2398>his<s%> farm, <S%G68><s%> <S%G1161><s%> another <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> <S%G848>his<s%> merchandise: <S%G1711><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3062>remnant<s%> <S%G2902>took<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1401>servants,<s%> and entreated them <S%G5195>spitefully,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G615>slew<s%> them.

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> thereof, he was wroth: <S%G3710><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he sent <S%G3992>forth<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G4753>armies,<s%> and <S%G622>destroyed<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G5406>murderers,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> burned <S%G1714>up<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> city. <S%G4172><s%>
